metadata.dc:author: Deneo, H
Espasandín, J
Cendán, M E
Carlevaro, A
Carzoglio, J C
Vignale, R A
metadata.dc:description: The authors present the case of an 18 years old male patient with a tumor localized in the skin of the nose, which had a fast evolution provoking in a month regional metastases. Histologically it proved to be an alveolar rhabdomyosarcoma. The clinical and histopathological characters are described, and considerations about the origin of this tumor are made.
metadata.dc:title: Rabdomiosarcoma alveolar de localización cutánea.
[Alveolar rhabdomyosarcoma of the skin].
